content:
Can you help me write a letter to my roommates? here are the details:
- I live at 743 clayton street with my roommates
- I want to send them a note about revitalizing our common space in our living room downstairs
- the purpose of the revitalization is to create a better space for us to hang out and spend more time together
- phase one of the revitalization is adding a TV, TV stand, and coffee table
- phase two is adding an additional section couch, if desired
- I (Jason) am happy to take point on finding furniture on facebook marketplace. I'll share it for approval and the roommates can all split the costs
